name: Table Builder 2.0
description:
Table Builder 2.0 is here and more robust than ever! Build a table quickly with interactive table cells, variants, states, auto-layout, and much, much more.


A tutorial is included to get you started with learning how to use the components. In here, you'll learn some tricks and shortcuts to:


-> Navigating components with nested variants

-> Overriding interactive states for instances

-> Indenting the table cells to create nested tables

-> Changing the divider style for the table cell

-> Stylizing the components to fit your company's style!


There are also small additional components such as:


-> Interactive button

-> Table Filter Toolbar

-> Column Template

-> Row template

-> Interactive overflow menu

-> Search

-> Dropdown

-> Tags

-> Icon container (how I easily scale my icons to any size)

-> Indent (create nested table cells)


I've really appreciated all the support from the original Table Builder release with over 2.7k downloads and this is my thank you! Please leave your feedback in the comments.


For those that don't have interactive components yet, you can still use these components to their fullest! When you get the feature, you'll be able to utilize it if you'd like :)


This was a ton of work so I don't plan on adjusting it too much but I'd love your thoughts on the file and I'm looking forward to seeing what you create with it!


Reach out on twitter at @DimitriOtero!
